com.sina.weibo.view

类 TouchImageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ImageView
      • com.sina.weibo.view.TouchImageView
  • 直接已知子类:
    SplitTouchImageView

    public class TouchImageView
extends ImageView
    支持多点触控的ImageView
    作者:
    SinaDev
